title: Jess Phillips – 2022 Comments on IPSA Guidelines Allowing MPs to Claim for Christmas Parties
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jess Phillips, the Labour MP for Birmingham Yardley, on Twitter on 22 November 2022.
content:
Just want to say no one asked for this, no one I know will use it. The guidance wasn’t made by MPs and yet we will be pilloried for it. I think it’s really irresponsible to issue this guidance as if MPs have been clamouring for it when I’ve literally never heard anyone do that.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
